metadata.title: CVE-2023-51258 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak issue discovered in YASM v.1.3.0 allows a local attacker tocause a denial of service via the new_Token function in themodules/preprocs/nasm/nasm-pp:1512.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
